assignments.description: Assign Mobile "Id" into Desktop "recordId" variable. Note: after peer review, this element is not even required but will be kept for regression test purposes.
assignments.name: Assign_Id_into_recordId
assignments.label: Assign mobile "Id" to desktop "RecordId"

value.stringValue: Need extra crew for the job, requested for {!Screen_Please_select_crew_type} {!Screen_Please_select_crew_type_WW}

decisions.name: Check_service_area_and_type_of_work
decisions.label: Check service area and type of work

decisions.name: Check_service_area_and_type_of_work_0
decisions.label: Check service area and type of work

decisions.description: This Decision is used to check whether the status of the Service Appointment equals "On Site" - the only status that allows the user to use the "RAR" feature. If not, then show an error message on screen.
decisions.name: Decision_Check_ServiceAppointment_Status
decisions.label: Check Service Appointment Status

decisions.description: Check the resource type and create the service appointment or the work order based on the resource type. The resource type maps to the work type
decisions.name: Decision_Check_the_ResourceType
decisions.label: Check the Resource Type

decisions.description: This decision is used to determine the "Service Area" of the Work Order/Service Appointment that triggered this flow. This will then be used later in the flow to decide what type of RAR should be created.
decisions.name: Decision_Check_WorkType_ServiceArea
decisions.label: Check "Service Area" on Work Type

decisions.description: This decision caters for the usecase, that a "Update Status" could also be requested from Salesforce Desktop (e.g. by a Job Coordinator) and not only from the Field Service Mobile App. It checks, whether the flow was opened from the Field Service Mobile App or from Desktop at the beginning of the flow. If the variable "Id" is filled it is opened from the Mobile App, if the variable "recordId" is filled, then it was opened from Desktop and then populates the "Id" variable to prevent failure in the next step
decisions.name: Decision_OpenedFromMobileOrDesktop
decisions.label: Opened from FSL Mobile App or Desktop?

Flow.description:
https://watercarestp.atlassian.net/browse/MSRS-232 V10- scheduling the appointment V11- Adding inline due date for Work Order V13- Trying to work out in mobile and desktop both V14- Workaround to pass both id and record id V17- removing the work around as it's not working V18-adding the confirmation screen V30- Updating the Available for RAR value
02/09/22 - V42/43: Improve error screens, tidy up naming conventions for flow elements. See https://watercarestp.atlassian.net/browse/MSRS-1934 for details. 9/10/2022- V17: Adding chatter notification for RAR 1/02/2023- V28: Adding the crew type options for extra crew 7/02/2023- V34: Arranging the work type in ascending order
Flow.interviewLabel: MSN - Field Service Mobile App - RAR {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: MSN - Field Service Mobile App - RAR

screens.description: Shows an Error Message to the user in case no "Service Area" has been defined on the corresponding field on the Work Type that is related to the Service Appointment Triggering this flow.
screens.name: Screen_Invalid_ServiceArea
screens.label: Invalid Service Area

fields.name: Screen_Invalid_ServiceArea_Error_Message
fields.fieldText:
Error - Service Area missing on Work Type

It looks like there is no “Service Area” defined for the type of work you selected for RAR. 


Please get in touch with your friendly Salesforce Support team and make them aware of this error.

screens.description: Shows an Error Message to the user in case the status of the current Service Appointment is not in the correct status to request a RAR (e.g. None, Scheduled, Completed).
screens.name: Screen_InvalidJobStatus
screens.label: Invalid Job Status

fields.name: Screen_InvalidJobStatus_Error_Message
fields.fieldText:
Error - Invalid Job Status

It looks like your Job is not in the right status to request a RAR. 


It might not be "On-site" yet or is already completed. Please use the “Update job status” functionality first and then try again.

screens.description: Shows an Error Message to the user in case the flow could not determine whether to create a Service Appointment or a Work Order for the RAR request. This is a hypothetical error that might not actually happen.
screens.name: Screen_InvalidRAR
screens.label: Invalid RAR

fields.name: Screen_InvalidRAR_Error_Message
fields.fieldText:
Error - Invalid RAR

Sorry - it looks like we couldn’t determine what type of RAR to create for your selection.


Please get in touch with your friendly Salesforce Support team and make them aware of this error.

fields.name: Screen_MSNCrewRAR_Success_Message
fields.fieldText:
Success!

We have informed the job coordinator that you need "{!Screen_Please_select_crew_type}"

screens.description: Shows an Error Message to the user in case no Record ID is populated in either the "ID" variable or "recordID" variable.
screens.name: Screen_NoRecordId_Error
screens.label: No Record Id

fields.name: Screen_NoRecordId_Error_Message
fields.fieldText:
Error - No Service Appointment Record Id

It looks like there was no Record ID for the Service Appointment prepopulated when opening this feature.


Please get in touch with your friendly Salesforce Support team and make them aware of this error.

fields.fieldText:
Success!

We have informed the job coordinator that you need {!var_WorkTypeChoiceName}

textTemplates.name: Extra_Crew_Notification
textTemplates.text: A RAR has been raised, you can find the details on the work order- {!var_WorkOrder.WorkOrderNumber} Field crew has requested for Extra Crew.

textTemplates.name: RAR_Notification
textTemplates.text: A RAR has been raised, you can find the details on the work order- {!var_WorkOrder.WorkOrderNumber} Field crew has requested for {!var_WorkTypeChoiceName}

variables.description: This Record Variable stores the full Service Appointment record including all fields retrieved from the lookup "Get Service Appointment Details".
variables.name: var_Service_Appointment
